resources.string: This channel is for high priority messages
This channel is for normal priority messages
This channel is for low priority messages
No links here, you can relax now.

Add any link (tweets, posts, videos‚Ä¶) 
 by simply sharing them to ReadIT
 from whichever app you're on!

 Also, checkout the remaining time in the notification
 to know how much time you have 'til they disappear.

 It's as simple as that!

I\'m Alberto, an Italian developer who stopped counting unread articles on Pocket way too long ago.\n During Christmas Break \'17 I decided to make this app, so that I wouldn\'t miss out on any link that I wanted to read in 2018.\n I really hope you\'re gonna find it as useful as I do.
On a more technical note, I made it in Kotlin (and had a lot of fun while doing it) and the code is open source.
If you want to reach out or see the code, here are some buttons for you.
